Topic.Title: It sure didn't take Hillary long

Message.Msg: Phil, you don't pay attention. The deal was sealed 24 hours before Hillary arrived. They had to wait to announce it until she got there. That way she can say what you just said. I think you're ticked that Israel has a great defensive dome that protects them. Unfair in your mind, right Phil?

Message.Title: obama is a murderer and a liar and so is everyone who supports him.
voter fraud accusations by repu#$%$ is 100% #$%$
Facts about election 2012
Message.Msg: Total Vote, 122000000, 100.0% Obama, 61732000, 50.6% Romney, 58316000, 47.8% Other, 1952000, 1.6% Obama won the majority (over 50.0%) by 0.6% or 732000 votes. Romney + Other = 49.4% or 60268000 votes. So 49.4% of voters voted for somebody other than Obama. However, it is also true: Obama + Other = 63684000 or 52.2% voted for Other Than Romney. Obama got 3416000 more votes than Romney or 2.8& more of total. Meanwhile some 3 million registered Republicans and 7 million registered Democrats did not show up to vote. **** In my opinion, America lost the opportunity to be lead, out of this economic quagmire, by a successful, decent, honorable and competent man. Instead, they voted for the charismatic socialist because he was black and Democrat.
YOU fk on idiot IDIOT! That's nearly 4 million votes Obama beat romn by.

Message.Msg: Hey IGNORAMUS! 3.416 million votes does NOT round up to 4 million. It rounds DOWN to 3 million. Or 3.4 million. NINCOMPOOP!

Topic.Title: Obama beat romn by almost 3% 3% of 122 million is almost 4 million not 600k you stinking f face

Message.Msg: But note that Obama got 50.6% of total votes, which is a 0.6% majority and only 732,000 votes total. And yes, it is true, America will suffer through another four more years of this incompetent nitwit! For at least the next quarter he will blame continuing economic malaise on Hurricane Sandy. Then he will blame the Republicans. He will blame anybody but his own incompetence. 20 year old girls sold their liberty for free birth control pills!

"Lose my vote?" No, I've not voted for any mainstream party candidate in many elections. I've even voted "Peace and Freedom" a few times, not because I believe their line but as a protest against those swine that run both major parties. Amazing how "brave" people like you are when anonymous. If you were worth it I would locate you and have a talk. It can be done you know. My friend "Raptor" has done it on others.
